summary: This is an arrest warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York for Ghislaine Maxwell. It commands law enforcement to arrest her on charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury. The warrant was issued by Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual named in the arrest warrant, accused of multiple offenses related to the enticement and transportation of minors and perjury.

persons.name: Lisa Margaret Smith
persons.context: The issuing officer who signed the arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest Warrant Issued for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A U.S. magistrate judge issued an arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell on charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

keyFacts: An arrest warrant was issued for Ghislaine Maxwell on June 29, 2020.
The warrant lists federal charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.
The warrant was issued by U.S. Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, New York.
The document is a formal court command to law enforcement to arrest Ghislaine Maxwell.
The case number and issuing court (U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York) are specified.
